frontmatter.title: Card
frontmatter.notes: Partially a pass-thru from react-bootstrap, with custom subcomponents.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies the content of the component.

description.text: Specifies the content of the component.

props.name: className
props.docblock: The class to append to the base element.

description.text: The class to append to the base element.

props.name: className
props.docblock: The class name for the CardDeck component

description.text: The class name for the CardDeck component

props.name: children
props.docblock: The Card components to organize

description.text: The Card components to organize

props.name: columnSizes
props.docblock:
An object containing the desired column size at each breakpoint, following a similar
props API as ``react-bootstrap/Col``

description.text:
An object containing the desired column size at each breakpoint, following a similar
props API as ``react-bootstrap/Col``

props.name: hasInteractiveChildren
props.docblock:
Whether the child `Card` components are interactive/focusable. If not, a `tabindex="0"` is
added to be a11y-compliant

description.text:
Whether the child `Card` components are interactive/focusable. If not, a `tabindex="0"` is
added to be a11y-compliant

props.name: canScrollHorizontal
props.docblock: Whether the `CardDeck` supports horizontal scrolling when there are overflow children

description.text: Whether the `CardDeck` supports horizontal scrolling when there are overflow children

props.name: hasOverflowScrollItems
props.docblock:
Whether the children of CardDeck should be processed by `useOverflowScrollItems` to give
each child a known/stable CSS classname

description.text:
Whether the children of CardDeck should be processed by `useOverflowScrollItems` to give
each child a known/stable CSS classname

props.name: hasEqualColumnHeights
props.docblock: Whether to disable the default equal height cards

description.text: Whether to disable the default equal height cards

props.name: textElement
props.docblock: Optional node to display near actions. Should be either a plain text or an element containing text (e.g. link).

description.text: Optional node to display near actions. Should be either a plain text or an element containing text (e.g. link).

props.name: isStacked
props.docblock: Specifies whether to use stacked variant.

description.text: Specifies whether to use stacked variant.

props.name: orientation
props.docblock: Specifies which orientation to use. This prop will override context value if provided.

description.text: Specifies which orientation to use. This prop will override context value if provided.

props.docblock: The Card components to organize into a responsive grid

props.docblock:
An object containing the desired column size at each breakpoint, following a similar
props API as ``react-bootstrap/Col``

An object containing the desired column size at each breakpoint, following a similar

props.name: hasEqualColumnHeights
props.docblock: Whether to disable the default equal height cards across rows in the card grid

props.name: actions
props.docblock:
Optional node to render on the top right of the card header,
 i.e. ActionRow or a DropdownMenu.

description.text:
Optional node to render on the top right of the card header,
 i.e. ActionRow or a DropdownMenu.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: Icon that will be shown in the top-left corner.

props.name: variant
props.docblock: Specifies variant to use.

description.text: Specifies variant to use.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Specifies title for the `Card.Status`.

description.text: Specifies title for the `Card.Status`.

props.name: actions
props.docblock: Specifies any optional actions, e.g. button(s).

description.text: Specifies any optional actions, e.g. button(s).

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: orientation
props.docblock: Specifies which orientation to use.

props.name: isClickable
props.docblock: Specifies whether the `Card` is clickable, if `true` appropriate `hover` and `focus` styling will be added.

description.text: Specifies whether the `Card` is clickable, if `true` appropriate `hover` and `focus` styling will be added.

props.name: isLoading
props.docblock: Specifies loading state.

description.text: Specifies loading state.

props.name: variant
props.docblock: Specifies `Card` style variant.

description.text: Specifies `Card` style variant.

props.name: muted
props.docblock: **Deprecated**. Specifies whether `Card` uses `muted` variant. Use `variant="muted"` instead.

description.text: **Deprecated**. Specifies whether `Card` uses `muted` variant. Use `variant="muted"` instead.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The `Card` items for the `CardCarousel`.

description.text: The `Card` items for the `CardCarousel`.

props.name: ariaLabel
props.docblock: Text describing the CardCarousel for screen readers

description.text: Text describing the CardCarousel for screen readers

props.name: title
props.docblock: An optional title.

description.text: An optional title.

props.name: subtitle
props.docblock: An optional subtitle.

description.text: An optional subtitle.

props.name: columnSizes
props.docblock: Customize the responsive columnSizes used by the carousel.

description.text: Customize the responsive columnSizes used by the carousel.

props.name: hasInteractiveChildren
props.docblock: Whether the carousel has interactive children (e.g., clickable cards).

description.text: Whether the carousel has interactive children (e.g., clickable cards).

props.name: canScrollHorizontal
props.docblock: Whether the carousel can be scrolled manually by users.

description.text: Whether the carousel can be scrolled manually by users.

props.name: disableOpacityMasks
props.docblock: Whether the default opacity masks should be shown at the start/end, if applicable.

description.text: Whether the default opacity masks should be shown at the start/end, if applicable.

props.name: onScrollPrevious
props.docblock: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the previous element.

description.text: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the previous element.

props.name: onScrollNext
props.docblock: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the next element.

description.text: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the next element.

props.name: CardCarouselControls
props.docblock: Optional override for the default `CardCarouselControls`

description.text: Optional override for the default `CardCarouselControls`
